title: cant gift my friend rp !
body: I have opened to store to gift a friend some rp  when i click Purchase RP for a friend It skips Choose gift and goes straight to finalize Please Help and Fix this

replies.body: If you check the notifications (in client, or even on the website here (the blue ! icon), you will see that RP gifting is currently disabled for some reason.
Yeah thanks. I did this post when before they announced it was unavailable
